attributes.action: ensure that as Michael Martin has more or less been forced to resign, that in all good conscience you do not elevate him, as of right, to the House of Lords. He does not deserve this honour due to his behaviour over the expenses affair, and the fact that he also has taken advantage of expenses to which he is probably not entitled.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
